page.title: 18The Lawns
page.content:
The people who own The Lawns grow wheat,barley,beet,oil seed rape, and have some rough grassland.Two people live in The Lawns.One man and the owner work on the farm. The buildings are made of bricks and tiles. It used to be a dairy farm but it is now an arable farm.The worker lives in a cottage on the farm. The owner has two horses for riding.He owns 10 fields and farms 200 acres.The animals kept are pigs and beef cattle.Crops are grown to earn money.The farm was built in 1872. The farmer's hobbies are riding and bowling.
Information about our area has been collected by the juniors of Moreton Say School_21 children aged between 7 and 11.The photographs were taken by a parent especially for the Project.
